message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $115?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I understand you're getting closer to the price you're willing to pay, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $112?
I appreciate the concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $107.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $109?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I'm not willing to go back to $105, Bob. I think we're getting close, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $108?
I think we're close, but I need to be within my budget. How about we meet at $106?
